<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Specialist's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1077)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 190 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Each _specialist's ring_ is dedicated to a single school of magic, and the ring is covered in symbols and glyphs related to that school according to the creator's arcane studies. A _specialist's ring_ has the trait corresponding to its school of magic. You gain a +2 item bonus to [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) checks, and a +1 circumstance bonus to recognize magical effects and items of the specific school of magic.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a wizard school spell of the corresponding school. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
